title: Timestamp
description: A value that represents a point in time

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

value.description: The time, in `timeUnit`s, before or after the Unix Epoch (1970-01-01T00:00:00Z).

timeUnit.description: The time unit that the `value` represents.
